# image

**Instance Property**

The image that the list item displays in its leading region.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Managing Content

- **text**: The list item’s primary text.
- **setText(_:)**: Updates the list item’s primary text.
- **detailText**: The list item’s secondary text.
- **setDetailText(_:)**: Updates the list item’s secondary text.
- **setImage(_:)**: Updates the list item’s image.
- **maximumImageSize**: The maximum size of a list item’s image and accessory image.

items.description: Updates the list item’s primary text.

items.description: Updates the list item’s secondary text.
